recordId.title: Record ID
recordId.description: The primary Salesforce record ID used to retrieve the main recipient's email address. For revised emails, the record ID is retrieved from the conversation history.
recordId.einstein:description: The primary Salesforce record ID used to retrieve the main recipient's email address. Must be an 18-digit string.

additionalRecordIds.title: Additional Record IDs
additionalRecordIds.description: Optional list of additional Salesforce record IDs to retrieve more recipients' email addresses.
additionalRecordIds.einstein:description: Optional list of additional Salesforce record IDs to retrieve more recipients' email addresses.

userInput.title: User Input
userInput.description: A string provided by the user with instructions for drafting or revising the email.
userInput.einstein:description: A string containing instructions for drafting or revising the email.

supportiveTextualData.title: Supportive Textual Data
supportiveTextualData.description: Textual data relevant to drafting the email, including conversation history and results from prior actions.
supportiveTextualData.einstein:description: All textual data that may be relevant to drafting the email. It may include conversation history and prior action results.

latestEmailDraft.title: Latest Email Draft
latestEmailDraft.description: The latest version of the email draft. Required only when revising a previous draft. Retrieve the draft from the conversation history.
latestEmailDraft.einstein:description: A JSON object containing the latest version of the email draft. Required only when the user wants to revise an earlier draft. The email must be retrieved from the conversation history.
